flash.tools.debugger.concrete

Class DMessageCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • flash.tools.debugger.concrete.DMessageCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DProtocolNotifierIF

    public class DMessageCounter
extends Object
implements DProtocolNotifierIF
    This class can be to count the number of messages received during a debug session.
